summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Divine Aura e-commerce website. Core functionality working with overlay click issues on Add to Cart and form submit buttons

ui_bugs.issue: Button visible but not clickable due to overlay interception. Product card div or navbar intercepts pointer events
ui_bugs.workaround: Force click works but not ideal for users

ui_bugs.issue: Form submit button not clickable due to luxury-card div intercepting pointer events
ui_bugs.workaround: Form fills correctly but cannot submit

ui_bugs.issue: Cart count badge not updating after adding items to cart

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section, 7 featured products, brand story sections
Navigation bar shows all required links: Home, Shop, Aura Analysis, Consult, About, Contact + Cart
Shop page displays all 17 products correctly
Product cards show image, name, benefit, price in ₹, aura tag
Aura Analysis quiz loads with 6 questions, multi-select options work
Consult form fields (name, phone, email, concern) work
Mobile responsive navigation with hamburger menu works
About and Contact pages accessible via navigation
All page routing and React Router navigation functional
success_percentage: 85% - Major features working, overlay click issues need fixing
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix overlay interception issues preventing Add to Cart button clicks and form submissions. Update CSS z-index or pointer-events for luxury-card, product-card, and navbar elements
